verbose_text: After infection with viral or bacterial mimics, lysozyme activity increased in F1 control larvae infected with PAM3CSK4 and in F1 larvae with / without 0.1 and 1 mug/L BPA, and 10 mug/L BPS exposure.
evidence: lysozyme activity increased in F1 control larvae infected with PAM3CSK4 and in F1 larvae with/without 0.1 and 1 mug/L BPA
